articles.title: Domino's hires WorkInProgress in a major blow to MDC's CPB - AdAge.com

articles.description: The Caixin/Markit Purchasing Managers' Index for Chinese manufacturing came in at 53.6 for October, better than the 53.0 forecast by analysts in a Reuters poll.
